entry.summary:
In the context of GETRF project, we have developed many deliverables.

  • Description of the general architecture defined in this project

General Architecture, Paul Mulethaler, Pascale Minet, Emmanuel Baccelli, Cédric Adjih, November 2012.

  • Scheduling with Graph Coloring

Joint Routing and TDMA-based Scheduling to Minimize Delays in Grid Wireless Sensor Networks, Ichrak Amdouni, Cédric Adjih, Pascale Minet, February 2013.

  • Network coding for wireless networks

Codage réseau, Cédric Adjih, Ichrak Amdouni Hana Baccouch, Antonia Masucci, January 2014.

  • Duty Cycle

Architecture of low duty-cycle mechanisms, Nadjib Aitsaadi, Paul M..uhlethaler, Mohamed-Haykel Zayani, February 2014.

  • Opportunistic routing

Improving throughput in multihop networks using node mobility, Philippe Jacquet and Alonso Silva, February 2014.

  • Network coding

DragonNet: Specification, Implementation, Experimentation and Performance Evaluation, Ichrak Amdouni, Antonia Masucci, Hana Baccouch, Cedric Adjih, September 2014.
